name: Melinoë
description:
A game with strong influence  from Risk Of Rain 2.

We're a team of High school game development students who've finally finnished our game, please leave feedback!

You'll play through two levels of increasing difficulty, to then be able to go up against the mighty Zeus. You'll pick up new powers along the way to augment your playstyle.

Good Luck!

Controlls:

WASD - use these keys to move

SPACE - use this to jump

LMB - use this for shooting

F4 - To skip the level
